title: Permanently banned cause i told someone to go kill themselves.
body: I shouldnt be banned. I am the best league player up and coming in this next season. I play xin xao to the maximum level of mechanics. I can also play garen like a fuckin god. And my main Dr. Mundo will prolly be nerfed after you guys watch me play him. you guys made a mistake banning me. Why you do this. Im going playing in korea now because people are not retarded stupid there. My name will be on cereal boxes. I will make Faker my bitch and all of you will know my name. Remember the name Jyin. Many will think im trolling but i assure you, this post will get much attention when i win.

Yes, you DO deserve to be banned.  And if you say that again, you should be banned again and possibly turned in to the proper authorities.
I am glad you don't h8 m8, but it is not worth r8ing it 8/8.
LOL. LVL 28. NA! YOU ALL BOUGHT IT! YOU ALL BOUGHT IT, HOOK, LINE, AND SINKER, YOU ALL BOUGHT IT!
probably a noob

as a unranked player i want to tell you pile of freaking UNWANTED HUMAN BEING TO GO CRY A RIVER FOR ALL WE CARE.....


YOU BROTH THIS ON YOURSELF AND NO ONE ELSE WDF ARE YOU EVEN HERE CRYING TO US WHEN YOU KNOW WHAT YOU DID IS PURE WRONG IDIOTIC GENIUS OF A JERK THAT DOSE NOT CARE FOR PEOPLE'S FEELINGS!


Now do us a favor and GET OUT!
You seem like an angry business major.

Dude if he wish you or your family to die how would you have feel?


I know dude  i know you, i have seen many jerks get away with it


So why we don't do the same for this insolent jerk that he is, read this ZED? THIS IS PUBLIC HUMILIATION AND MAKE SURE YOU DON'T SHOW YOURSELF IN THIS PLACE EVER AGAIN!


The last thing i wanna do is provoke someone to die, that is Unhuman
